text: Hall Pass is a 2011 American romantic comedy movie that was produced by Charles B. Wessler, Bradley Thomas and Benjamin Waisbren and was directed by Farrelly brothers: Bobby & Peter. The movie was released on February 25, 2011. The movie received mixed reviews with a 37% on Rotten Tomatoes which is rotten and Metacritic rated the movie 47% out of 100. == Cast == *Owen Wilson as Rick *Jason Sudeikis as Fred *Jenna Fischer as Maggie *Christina Applegate as Grace *Joy Behar as Dr. Lucy *Stephen Merchant as Gary *J.B. Smoove as Flats *Richard Jenkins as Coakley *Alexandra Daddario as Paige *Nicky Whelan as Leigh *Vanessa Angel as Missy *Larry Joe Campbell as Hog Head *Alyssa Milano as Mandy *Megan Joy as Burger Girl *Bo Burnham as Bartender == Other websites == *Hall Pass at warnerbrothers.com * * Category:2011 buddy movies Category:2011 romantic comedy movies Category:2010s sex comedy movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:2010s English-language movies
title: Hall Pass (movie)
